name: Oasis Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud computing platform designed to build smart contract applications. The company's platform permits privacy-preserving contracts, performance, and scalability for real-world complex applications and governs how data is moved and used across businesses, enabling companies to overcome performance, security, and privacy limitations that may have hampered blockchain adoption.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud computing platform designed to build smart contract applications. The company's platform permits privacy-preserving contracts, performance, and scalability for real-world complex applications and governs how data is moved and used across businesses, enabling companies to overcome performance, security, and privacy limitations that may have hampered blockchain adoption.
